Uber setup
https://riders.uber.com
support@uber.com
Please confirm your email address with Uber through native Uber mobile application or by visiting https://riders.uber.com
Your registered payment method is invalid. Please update the payment and billing information with Uber before calling a ride.
You are forbidden from making a ride request at this time and should consult our support team by visiting https://help.uber.com or by emailing support@uber.com
Please confirm your mobile phone number with Uber using the native Uber mobile application or by visiting https://riders.uber.com
The requested ride type is not available. Please select a different ride type to successfully make a request.
You have an outstanding balance. Please update your account settings by using the native mobile application or by visiting https://riders.uber.com
You are currently banned and are not permitted to request a ride.
You are temporarily blocked from making ride requests due to cancelling too many times.

For regulatory reasons, certain jurisdictions require Uber users to register their national ID number or passport number before taking a ride. Please enter your national ID number or passport number through native Uber app before requesting a ride.
An invalid product ID was requested. Retry the API call with a valid product ID.
No drivers are available for the requested ride type at this moment. Please select a different ride type or to wait until more drivers become available.

You must have at least one payment method registered with Uber to request a ride. Please add a payment method by using the native mobile application or by visiting https://riders.uber.com before requesting a ride.
The fare has expired for the requested ride type. Please get estimates again, confirm the new fare, and then request again.
An error has occurred when the attempting to request a ride type. Please reattempt the request on behalf of the user.
This ride type requires setting a destination for ride requests. Please enter a destination before retrying.
The destination is not supported for UberPOOL. Please enter a valid destination.
Number of seats exceeds max capacity.
An unknown error has occurred.
Surge pricing is currently in effect for this ride type. Please confirm the surge pricing before making ride request.
